alert.note: Alert for Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 05 at 5:56AM CST until January 05 at 6:15AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... * Until 615 AM CST. * At 556 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Lake Jackson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Jackson, Angleton, Richwood, and Bailey`s Prairie around 600 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
